channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SIMATIC Drive Controller CPU 1504D TF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SIMATIC Drive Controller CPU 1504D TF

item.title: CVE-2022-30694|2024-08-03T06:56:13.567Z -- siemens -- simatic%20drive%20controller%20cpu%201504d%20tf
item.description:
The login endpoint /FormLogin in affected web services does not apply proper origin checking.
This could allow authenticated remote attackers to track the activities of other users via a login cross-site request forgery attack.
